title: Discriminant Analysis Classification Algorithms
description: In this lab, we will learn about Linear and Quadratic Discriminant Analysis (LDA and QDA). LDA and QDA are classification algorithms that are used to find a linear and quadratic decision boundary, respectively, between two or more classes. We will use the scikit-learn library to implement these algorithms and visualize the decision boundaries.

meta.title: Linear and Quadratic Discriminant Analysis | Machine Learning Algorithms
meta.description: Explore Linear and Quadratic Discriminant Analysis (LDA and QDA) classification algorithms using Python and scikit-learn. Learn to visualize decision boundaries and apply these techniques to real-world datasets.
meta.keywords: Linear Discriminant Analysis, Quadratic Discriminant Analysis, Classification Algorithms, Machine Learning, Data Visualization
